title: Can't Even
body:
This isn't QQ, just retelling an experience.

Now I know Elo Hell is just some stupid thing people make up as excuse for their lack of skill, but I can see where they're coming from sometimes.

Just last game, it was pretty much me (Ziggs) vs the other team. Twitch was AFK for the first 20 minutes then came back and went like 1/15. WW was AFK at the end, and that's not the worst part.

Right at the end of the game, we had an amazing 3v5 teamfight where we aced them, with me, Tryndamere and Sona ult and we were pushing hard down mid. As we got their inhib we had about 20 seconds, and I knew we could end with our pushing power. But then, bloody Tryndamere decides to go top and farm, as full build nonetheless.

When they respawned and killed me and Sona, trying desperately to finish off the nexus, which was at half HP, they pushed back and won.

I don't wanna blame, but if we had Trynd with us, we could have easily won the game. Now, I don't care much, because it was only normal, but if that was ranked I would have blown my fuse (geddit cos I was playing Ziggs, PUNS OF DAMAGE!).

I can't even sometimes...
